Typedef AGWPE_HDR

typedef struct _agwpe_hdr_ AGWPE_HDR
struct _agwpe_hdr_ 
   { 
     unsigned char port; Radio port
     unsigned char reserved[3]; Reserved
     char datakind; Type of AGWPE message
     unsigned char reserved2; Reserved
     unsigned char pid; PID of the received AGWPE message
     unsigned char reserved3; Reserved
     char callfrom[10]; From callsign
     char callto[10]; To callsign
     unsigned long datalen; Indicates how much data will follow
     unsigned long user; ???
   }
